title: PVK Q/A Nov 8: Kanye Resurrects Kim's Dad, Is that like Christianity?
description:
0:00-1:03 Welcome
1:04-3:45 Is Lady Wisdom God? 
3:46-18:15 Does Christian Apologetics Turn People away from Christianity? 
18:16-38:20 Kanye makes a hologram of Kim's father for her birthday. Resurrection? 
38:21-50:30 Miscarriages and the Resurrection
50:31-54:43 Archecture and Art in Protestant churches
54:44-1:06:40  Supercessionism and Israel
1:06:41-1:10:10   Relevance Realization and moral intuition
1:10:11-1:16:21   Which NT Wright book did you recommend to Jordan Peterson? 
1:16:22-1:19:22   Connection between OCD and Blasphemy against the Holy Spirit
1:19:23-1:20:36   Did 6th century Kingdom of Judah deserve exile? 
1:20:37-1:28:36   Is the Spirituality of the Bohemian Grove Real? 
1:28:37-1:31:16   Chris Hedges
1:31:17-1:47:12  The rest of them... :)
